commit.message:
Merge pull request #895 from linxiaohao123/master

实验9

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,29 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    package="com.lsh.news"
+    android:versionCode="1"
+    android:versionName="1.0" >
+
+    <uses-sdk
+        android:minSdkVersion="8"
+        android:targetSdkVersion="18" />
+    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET"/>
+
+    <application
+        android:allowBackup="true"
+        android:icon="@drawable/hzu"
+        android:label="@string/app_name"
+        android:theme="@style/AppTheme" >
+        <activity
+            android:name="com.lsh.news.MainActivity"
+            android:label="@string/app_name" >
+            <intent-filter>
+                <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
+
+                <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
+            </intent-filter>
+        </activity>
+        <activity android:name="BrowseNewsActivity"></activity>
+    </application>
+
+</manifest>

@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="vertical" >
+
+    <WebView
+        android:id="@+id/webView"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent" />
+
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="vertical"
+    tools:context=".MainActivity" >
+
+    <ListView
+        android:id="@+id/lvNews"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent" >
+    </ListView>
+
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,37 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent" >
+
+    <ImageView
+        android:id="@+id/ivPic"
+        android:layout_width="42dp"
+        android:layout_height="42dp"
+        android:src="@drawable/ic_launcher" />
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/tvTitle"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_toRightOf="@id/ivPic"
+        android:text="title"
+        android:textSize="18sp" />
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/tvDesc"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_below="@id/tvTitle"
+        android:layout_toRightOf="@id/ivPic"
+        android:text="desc" />
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/tvTime"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
+        android:text="time"
+        android:textSize="10sp" />
+
+</RelativeLayout>
\ No newline at end of file
